metaData.label: SaoPaulo
metaData.criteriaDescription: licenseNumber begins with SP OR addressCity equal Sao Paulo OR addressCity equal São Paulo OR addressState equal São Paulo OR addressState equal SP

criteria.default_path_1: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="OR" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition Key="Digital Identity Hub Profiles.licenseNumber" Operator="Begins" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><Value><![CDATA[SP]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="Digital Identity Hub Profiles.addressCity" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><Value><![CDATA[Sao Paulo]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="Digital Identity Hub Profiles.addressCity" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><Value><![CDATA[São Paulo]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="Digital Identity Hub Profiles.addressState" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><Value><![CDATA[São Paulo]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="Digital Identity Hub Profiles.addressState" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><Value><![CDATA[SP]]></Value></Condition></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>
